com.sap.integration.utils.integrationdb.jpa

Class JpaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.integration.utils.integrationdb.jpa.JpaManager

  • public class JpaManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class, which handles database connection, EntityManager and Transaction life cycle(s) for the given persistence unit. You may implement your own database connector, JPA layer and JPA Manager.
